title: Preparations for Simplified Upgrade - MediationZone Documentation 9.3 - InfoZone
text: The preparation steps will not affect the running system and can be done in advance. Ensure that the environment variables are set correctly: Example - Setting Environment Variables export MZ_HOME=/opt/mz export JAVA_HOME=/opt/jdk/jdk-17.0.2 export PATH=$JAVA_HOME/bin:$MZ_HOME/bin:$PATH Make a system export of all your configurations with System Export. mzsh mzadmin/<password> systemexport <backup directory>/<filename> Note! These configurations must be imported after the upgrade. For safety, make an online backup of the database(s). For information about how to perform an online backup, see Backup and Disaster Recovery Procedures .
